actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To amend the National Narcotics Leadership Act of 1988 to repeal the termination of the Office of National Drug Control Policy in 1993, and to authorize appropriations to carry out that Act through fiscal year 1990.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the National Narcotics Leadership Act of 1988 terminating the Office of National Drug Control Policy. Authorizes appropriations to carry out such Act for FY 1989 through 1990.

titles.title: To amend the National Narcotics Leadership Act of 1988 to repeal the termination of the Office of National Drug Control Policy in 1993, and to authorize appropriations to carry out that Act through fiscal year 1990.
